block.name: Short To Float
block.doc: Convert a 16-bit short integer stream to floating point (real) stream.

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.

param.name: Scale
param.doc: Sets the scale factor for the conversion. For example: to normalize an integer sinewave with amplitude 1000, enter 1000 in this box.
